title: 820-2914 GPU issue?
message:
I have this 17" MacBook Pro that have been sitting here for a while now. It shows clear signs of GPU issues. Starts booting but the screen goes black for half a second and then goes white.
Anything to to with this board or should I just put it in the parts bin? I have replaced the tantulum capasitors at the GPU VCore output.

title: 820-2914 GPU issue?
message: Come one man, you really don't know about a recall that has been going on for 3 years now? Take it to Apple and undo the crap you did to it.

title: 820-2914 GPU issue?
message: Yes I do :), but there were more things wrong with it when it arrived into my hands :)

title: 820-2914 GPU issue?
message: Can't go to Apple with a computer with repaired backlight :P
